Class KeyStoreSigner

java.lang.Object
org.webpki.crypto.KeyStoreSigner
All Implemented Interfaces:
AsymKeySignerInterface, CertificateSelectorSpi, X509SignerInterface
public class KeyStoreSigner extends Object implements X509SignerInterface, CertificateSelectorSpi
Sign data using the KeyStore interface.
